results.title: Metformin may improve the outcome of patients with colorectal cancer and type 2 diabetes mellitus partly through effects on neutrophil extracellular traps.
results.text_hl: The effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Periodic_fever_familial_autosomal_dominant</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536657 @@@neutrophil extracellular traps@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Periodic_fever_familial_autosomal_dominant</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536657 @@@NETs@@@) were examined with in-vitro experiments and multiplex immunohistochemistry of surgically resected @DISEASE_Colorectal_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D015179 @@@CRC@@@ specimens.

results.title: Hexavalent chromium inhibits the formation of neutrophil extracellular traps and promotes the apoptosis of neutrophils via AMPK signaling pathway.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@), as an @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_78975 @@@AMPK@@@ activator, triggered autophagy and thus alleviated the inhibitory effect of @CHEMICAL_chromium_hexavalent_ion @CHEMICAL_MESH:C074702 @@@Cr(VI)@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Periodic_fever_familial_autosomal_dominant</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536657 @@@NETs@@@.
